ygData.subject: Re: Hollow Skull
ygData.msgSnippet: Hmm i got one ruby pedant in paw if it is what you are talking about it looks like ruby in my backpack but i can wear it and it gives +1 int. I heared one guy
ygData.messageBody:
Hmm i got one ruby pedant in paw if it is what you are talking about it
looks like ruby in my backpack but i can wear it and it gives +1 int. I
heared one guy that he found a hollow skull and that it have a 2 places to
combine but im not sure any more about where he found it. If i dont miss i
see this post in monk onelist list.


At 11.47 03/07/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "Mark Mazurik" <mmazurik@...>
>
>If anybody knows where I can find a hollow skull, please let me know. If
>you can isolate it down to a specific loc in a specific zone, that would be
>best. The hollow skull when combined with two rubies (one from the high
>shaman in Splitpaw and one from Lyunga in Innothule swamp) supposedly makes
>a jeweled skull. Supposedly Yiz Pon in W.Karana says he is being followed
>by a gnoll assassin who soon appears after you talk to him and supposedly
>the skull is found on the gnoll assassin. The jeweled skull is supposedly
>+5 int +20 mana +20 hp -5 cold resistance.
>
>Thanks in advance
>Mark Mazurik
